statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin
, BB.ChannelName , CC.BrandName
FROM dbo.LMChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LMChannel BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin
, BB.CustomerName , CC.BrandName
FROM dbo.LMChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LMChannel BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.LMChannelBrand ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, ChannelID, BrandID, StartDate, EndDate, ChannelMargin, BrandMargin ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #ChannelID#, #BrandID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #ChannelMargin#, #BrandMargin# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.LMChannelBrand SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, ChannelID = #ChannelID# , BrandID = #BrandID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , ChannelMargin = #ChannelMargin# , BrandMargin = #BrandMargin# WHERE ID = #ID#
